column3: cr ACK fa4cebadcffd9112da4b13c7cc7ccf21e2bee887: patch looks correct and commit hash starts with `fa`
fun fact: I tried to minimize the test by writing `Assert(Assume(two == 2))`, but that only works in [C++20](http://www.open-std.org/jtc1/sc22/wg21/docs/papers/2017/p0315r4.pdf).

The added lines are intended to test `Assume`, therefore we could s/`Assert(result);`/`BOOST_CHECK(true);`/ to suppress "Test case util_tests/util_check did not check any assertions" in
```
$ ./src/test/test_bitcoin -t util_tests/util_check -l test_suite
Running 1 test case...
Entering test module "Bitcoin Core Test Suite"
test/util_tests.cpp(48): Entering test suite "util_tests"
test/
Right. I meant it :) My copy-paste error...
